title: Omloop Het Nieuwsblad: Jan Tratnik Wins in Visma-Lease a Bike Masterpiece
content:
Matteo Jorgenson makes spectacular classics debut, with Wout van Aert sprinting to third behind Nils Politt to round out the podium.

Read the full article at Omloop Het Nieuwsblad: Jan Tratnik Wins in Visma-Lease a Bike Masterpiece on Velo.
author: ahood
